headline.main: Reader Responses to 'Prostitution and the Law'

docs.abstract: Here's a collection of comments in reaction to Nick's post about prostitution.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here's a collection of comments in reaction to Nick's post about prostitution that caught my attention. He's going to be writing about it in his column tomorrow.
